titles: A call to all bishops and others who are zealous for the Book of Common Prayer (for which I have been also sometimes zealous) by way of remembrance : now to come to the way of the Quakers to the grace of God ... / J.A.
author: Anderdon, John, 1624?-1685.
notes: Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
keywords: Church of England. --  Book of common prayer.
